attributes.action: Start paying polaticians according to their performance
attributes.additional_details: Start paying polaticians according to their performance To reinstate public confidence in the political system With a system that ensures the public interests are at heart and decisions our made in the best in of the people
attributes.background: Start paying polaticians according to their performance To reinstate public confidence in the political system With a system that ensures the public interests are at heart and decisions our made in the best in of the people

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
Decisions about politician's pay are a matter for the Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.
